pkgmetadata.longdescription: Modelling Pathways and Movement Potential Within a Landscape (Version 1.7.4) // Provides functionality to calculate cost surfaces based on slope (e.g. Herzog, 2010; Llobera and Sluckin, 2007 doi:10.1016/j.jtbi.2007.07.020; Pars Roche, 2002; Tobler, 1993), traversing slope (Bell and Lock, 2000), and landscape features (Llobera, 2000) to be used when modelling pathways and movement potential within a landscape (e.g. Llobera, 2015; Verhagen, 2013; White and Barber, 2012 doi:10.1016/j.jas.2012.04.017).
